primevc.utils.StringUtil

type
class

Static Methods

inline capitalize(v : String) : String

Method will change the first character of every word in the given string to uppercase

inline capitalizeFirstLetter(v : String) : String

Method will change the first character of the given string to uppercase

inline createUUID() : String

Method generates a UUID string UUID format xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx x = any hexadecimal character y = 8,9,a,b
